pullrequest.title: Split GetEntities feature into multiple subfeatures

content.raw: LGTM. The Windows issue seems to be caused by dartsim failing to compile. If Windows support is a priority, let me know and I can look into the dartsim issue. dartsim hasn’t made much effort to support Windows in several years, but I could put time towards it if we need it.
content.html: LGTM. The Windows issue seems to be caused by dartsim failing to compile. If Windows support is a priority, let me know and I can look into the dartsim issue. dartsim hasn’t made much effort to support Windows in several years, but I could put time towards it if we need it.
